title: Natal Aluminium Industry and Trade Limited Company

slider.title: Natal - Aluminium
slider.text: Natal Aluminium Ind. and Tra. Ltd. Cmp.

aboutus.text1: Natal has been established in 2007 and since then he has proved his quality and his yield for his products such as CaSi, CaFe, Ca Solid, FeTi, FeB, Aluminium, Carbon and Sulphur cored wires.
aboutus.text2: To make sustainable quality production according to customer needs
aboutus.text4: To find solutions to our customers within the shortest time
aboutus.text5: Monitoring technology closely and implement it
aboutus.text6: Metser A.S. which has ISO 9001:2015 quality certificate is produced the Cored Wires which are used in steel plants.

new1.title: 34th Internation Ferroalloys Conference
new1.text: We participated to 34th International Ferroalloys Conference been realised between 11-13 Nov. in Lisbon.

new2.title: Ankiros Fair
new2.text: We were participated to Ankiros Fair in Istanbul between 25-27 October. We would like to present our kind thankful to all visitors who visited us at this fair in where we established the new cooperations and found the opportunities to meeting our friends.
